title: Organic Aromas® Nebulizing Diffusers & Essential Oils
description: Organic Aromas is the pioneering inventor of the one-of-a-kind Nebulizing Diffuser. The world's most powerful and beautiful aromatherapy diffuser.
cleaned_text: Sign up to our Newsletter Receive an email with discounts, new product releases and exciting articles about aromatherapy and essential oils. The IFA was established in the United Kingdom in 1985 and is the world's first international aromatherapy organization who has become a leader in the professional development of aromatherapy. The International Aromatherapist Alliance (AIA) was established in 2006 and is a non-profit organization representing aromatherapists. AIA aims to raise the public's awareness of aromatherapy and ways it's used as a treatment method. NAHA is a non-profit organization whose goal is to expand the public's awareness of true aromatherapy. It's goal is to promote the public's further understanding and knowledge about the safety and the daily application of aromatherapy. Receive an email with discounts, new product releases and exciting articles about aromatherapy and essential oils.
